alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 1:57PM PST until January 16 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile to as low as 200 feet in dense fog. * WHERE...San Joaquin Valley, mainly areas east of Interstate 5. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 11 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy dense fog could develop early in the evening and will become more widespread.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
